name: Shadipedia
des: Shadipedia is a mobile application. In this application the user can select any type of wedding material that he/she is looking for. App will provide the price, timing, information and location of the Venue, Car Rental Agency, Car Decorators, Venue Decorators, Food Providers and Gold Shop. A brief study of comparison with the existing solutions is also provided.
